attributes.action: Get airlines to automatically refund all cancelled flights.
attributes.additional_details: Because they are avoiding customers,  ignoring emails and have removed the refund option online. Queuing times on the phone are up to 3 hours.
attributes.background: Force all airlines to automatically refund cancelled flights.  Instead of offering travel vouchers.

rejection.details:
Arrangements for refunding, changing or rebooking travel are a matter for individual airlines and travel agents, not the Government or Parliament.

We have published a petition calling on the Government to create a fund to reimburse money lost due to covid-19 travel cancellations, which you might like to sign: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/304912

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
